subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first ruler of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के पहले राजा कौन थे?
explanation_en: The Princes of Mewar, specifically Udaipur Rathore family, were the first to unify Rajasthan and establish its identity. Udaipur Rathore's reign marks the beginning of Rajasthan's history.
explanation_hi: मेवार के राजनों, उत्पादक राजस्थान को समीकों के संतुल पर राजस्थान का विशाल हुआ है।
